title: Research Careers
content:
Academic Pathways

  • Graduate Studies: MS and PhD programs in ML/AI
  • Postdoctoral Research: Specialized research positions
  • Faculty Positions: Teaching and research roles

Research Labs

  • Industry Research: Corporate research laboratories
  • Government Labs: National research institutions
  • Non-profit Research: Mission-driven research organizations

Publication and Contribution

Strategies for making meaningful research contributions based on your approach to studying papers and foundational materials.
